Class AppointmentsController

java.lang.Object
sample.Controller.AppointmentsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
AppointmentsController. Displays appointments from the database.
